# we-tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                     | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `value`  | `value`   | If you want to use a simple tooltip you can only add this value | `string` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name              | Description                                                    |
| ----------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--background`    | Background of tooltip <br> Default: rgba(196, 196, 196, 0.5)); |
| `--border`        | Border of tooltip <br> Default: none                           |
| `--border-radius` | Border radius of tooltip <br> Default: 0                       |
| `--bottom`        | Bottom of tooltip <br> Default: auto                           |
| `--color`         | Color of tooltip <br> Default: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)                |
| `--height`        | Height of tooltip <br> Default: fit-content                    |
| `--left`          | Left of tooltip <br> Default: 50%                              |
| `--padding`       | Padding of tooltip <br> Default: 3px                           |
| `--right`         | Right of tooltip <br> Default: auto                            |
| `--top`           | Top of tooltip <br> Default: 100%                              |
| `--transform`     | Transform of tooltip <br> Default: translate(-50%, 0%)         |
| `--width`         | Width of tooltip <br> Default: fit-content                     |


----------------------------------------------
